chart.name: chart.invoice.per.customer
chart.title: Unpaid Invoices Per Customer
chart.dataset: SELECT COUNT(self.party) AS unpaidinvoices, MONTH(self.currentdateT) AS month, _party.name AS customer FROM Invoice self LEFT JOIN self.party AS _party WHERE YEAR(self.currentdateT) = YEAR(current_date) AND NOT self.status='Paid' GROUP BY _party.name, MONTH(self.currentdateT) ORDER BY month

chart.name: chart.party.per.state
chart.title: Customer Per State
chart.dataset: SELECT COUNT(p.id) AS partys, p.name AS customer, st.name AS state FROM gst_party p LEFT JOIN gst_party_address_list a ON (a.gst_party = p.id) LEFT JOIN gst_address aa ON (a.address_list = aa.id) LEFT JOIN gst_state st ON (aa.state = st.id) GROUP BY p.name, st.name

chart.name: chart.invoice.per.status
chart.title: Invoice Per Status
chart.dataset: SELECT SUM(self.grossAmount) AS amount, self.status AS status, _party.name AS customer FROM Invoice self LEFT JOIN self.party AS _party GROUP BY _party.name, self.status

chart.name: chart.invoice.per.status.count
chart.title: Number Of Invoice Per Status
chart.dataset: SELECT SUM(self.grossAmount) AS amount, MONTH(self.currentdateT) AS month, self.status AS status FROM Invoice self WHERE YEAR(self.currentdateT) = YEAR(current_date) GROUP BY MONTH(self.currentdateT), self.status ORDER BY month

chart.name: chart.invoice.per.category.per.product
chart.title: Invoice Per Category Per Product
chart.dataset: SELECT COUNT(*) AS invoicecount, pro.product_name AS products, invoice.status AS status FROM gst_invoice_line AS invoiceline LEFT JOIN gst_product AS pro ON (invoiceline.product = pro.id) LEFT JOIN gst_invoice invoice ON (invoiceline.invoice = invoice.id) GROUP BY invoice.status, pro.product_name
